overview: A walk through the streets of the city.  Work on the edge of a paradox, because it touches the problem of ideology in its own more ambiguous boundaries, hovering between the message of proselytizing and critical reflection, including the assumption of public responsibility by the artist - here he becomes almost a peaceful militant and political agitator, well beyond his role - and the “secret” size of the politics as entirely subjective passion and enthusiasm for life, but also as a moral obligation.
title: Public and secret diary
